idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# New TunePad cell

# define synth bassline function with initial rest
def play_synth_bassline():
    playNote(21, beats = 1)
    playNote(21, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(19, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(17, beats = 1)
    playNote(21, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(19, beats = 0.5)
    
# intial rest before starting the loop
rest(8)

    
# Loop the bassline to play continuously or set amount of time
for _ in range(16): #adjust how many times it loops
    play_synth_bassline()

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# New TunePad cell
# CHORDS – SYNTH PAD
def play_chords():
    rest(16)  # Rest for the first 16 beats
    beats_played = 16
    while beats_played < 320 - 8:  # Play until the final 8-beat rest
        for _ in range(2):  # Each loop iteration plays for 32 beats
            playNote([42, 46, 49], beats=4, velocity=60)
            playNote([44, 48, 51], beats=4, velocity=60)
            playNote([46, 49, 53], beats=4, velocity=60)
            playNote([44, 48, 53], beats=4, velocity=60)
            beats_played += 32
        rest(16)  # 16-beat break
        beats_played += 16
    rest(8)  # Final 8-beat rest before the end

# Call the chords function
play_chords()

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# New TunePad cell

kick = 1
snare = 3

# DRUMS – ELECTRIC DRUMS
def play_electric_drums():
    beats_played = 0
    while beats_played < 320:
        if 160 <= beats_played < 176:  # Middle 16-beat rest section
            rest(16)
            beats_played += 16
        else:
            playNote(kick, beats=1, velocity=80)
            playNote(snare, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
            playNote(kick, beats=0.5, velocity=100)
            playNote(kick, beats=1, velocity=80)
            playNote(snare, beats=1, velocity=100)
            beats_played += 16  # Add the total beats played in each iteration

# Call the electric drums function
play_electric_drums()

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
# New TunePad cell
# DRUMS – HIHAT / TOM
def play_hihat_tom():
    rest(16)  # Initial rest for the first 16 beats
    beats_played = 16
    
    while beats_played < 320 - 8:  # Play until the final 8-beat rest
        # Play for 16 beats
        for _ in range(2):  # Each loop iteration plays for 8 beats; repeat twice for 16 beats total
            playNote(8, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
            playNote(5, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
            playNote(8, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
            playNote(5, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
            playNote(8, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
            playNote(5, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
            playNote(8, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
            playNote(5, beats=0.5, velocity=80)
        
        beats_played += 16  # Track the beats played

        # 8-beat rest between each 16-beat section
        rest(8)
        beats_played += 8
    
    rest(8)  # Final 8-beat rest before the end

# Call the hihat/tom function
play_hihat_tom()
